name: The 7-Dimensional Telescope in action at night.
An image demonstrating the field of view of the 7-Dimensional Telescope.

Pseudo-color Images of the Helix Nebula taken at wavelengths of 370 nm, 500 nm, and 650 nm, corresponding to blue, green, and red.
